contents.text: Welcome to Sonder, an entirely new way to stay in your favorite neighborhoods around the world.
To make a new reservation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our reservations team.

navigationGoals: Book a two-night stay in my preferred neighborhood for next week
I need to book a one-week stay near the VA hospital in San Diego for my upcoming appointment.
Provision a new reservation for Aug 15–18 in San Francisco and confirm the rate code.
I’d like to make a new three-night reservation next month in Boston.
I'd like to book a two-bedroom apartment in Berlin for my upcoming research trip next month.

contents.text: To inquire about long-term stays, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our extended stays specialist.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and availability for a six-week extended stay
I’m a veteran relocating to Denver for a civilian job and need a furnished monthly stay for three months starting in September.
Query long-term stay pricing and availability for a 30-night booking in New York starting Sept 1.
I want to ask about monthly rates for a long-term stay.
I'm planning a three-month research stay and need details on Sonder's long-term rates and availability.

contents.text: For assistance with existing bookings and customer support, press 2.
To modify or cancel your reservation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our booking support team.

navigationGoals: Reschedule my upcoming reservation to new dates
I need to change my existing reservation dates from August 5–10 to August 7–12 due to a schedule change.
Modify my existing reservation: change check-in from Sept 10 to Sept 12 and upgrade room type.
I need to change the check-in date on my existing reservation.
I need to adjust my check-out date by one day on my current reservation in New York.

contents.text: For billing or payment inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Resolve an unexpected charge on my recent bill
I need a detailed invoice for my last stay in New York to submit for reimbursement.
Review my invoice for reservation #12345, verify charges, and update my payment method.
I have a question about a charge on my bill.
I have a question about an unexpected charge on my bill for my recent stay in San Francisco.
